channel.title: When will priv servers be as good as 'real' servers
channel.description:
ive notice that during the past few months, private servers have been getting more and more advanced. unfortunately, since we can only start with client, we cant access jagex's server code unless some disgruntled jagex staff leaks it, lol.
so that means that we'll have to write the server stuff (quests, npcs,skills, minigames etc) all from scratch. even then, private servers are often buggy
at this rate when do u think that priv servers will eb as good as jagex's todasy?
my guess is at least 3 years.

item.title: When will priv servers be as good as 'real' servers
item.dc:creator: @doctorwho278 doctorwho278
item.description:
@doctorwho278 wrote:

i thought i will tell you my freinds dad works for jagex and sorry to dissapoint you but they will never leak it i mwish they would but i can get the cd of him and say im making a game like runescape and maybe send the details to evryone but before i can do that you need to promise me you will not report me to jagex and i’d love my own server but i dont know how to
p.s i will have the cd by next week

Read full topic
item.source: When will priv servers be as good as 'real' servers

Yes about 3 years and a half.
